title: ‘The Great British Baking Show’ Season 13, Episode 4: “Mexican Week” | Everything Is Cake
description:
Kate and Amelia tackle much-maligned and quite controversial “Mexican Week,” which includes a pan dulce signature, taco technical, and tres leches showstopper challenge.
Hosts: Kate Halliwell and Amelia Wedemeyer
Producer: Sasha Ashall
